title: People who trust their doctor tend to feel better

title_detail.value: People who trust their doctor tend to feel better

summary: Confidence in doctors, therapists and nursing staff leads to an improvement in subjectively perceived complaints, satisfaction and quality of life in patients, concludes a meta-analysis by psychologists.

summary_detail.value: Confidence in doctors, therapists and nursing staff leads to an improvement in subjectively perceived complaints, satisfaction and quality of life in patients, concludes a meta-analysis by psychologists.
